```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)

library(stats)
```

# Intro
This is a linear regression model

# Compare my linear model with orginial R function
```{r}
  n = 1e3; p = 20
  beta = runif(p+1, -5, 5)
  X = matrix(rnorm(n*p, 10, 0.1),n,p)
  error = rnorm(n, 0, 1)
  Y = cbind(rep(1,n),X) %*% beta + error
  compare = bench::mark( as.vector(lm(Y~X)$coefficients), as.vector(linearFit(X,Y)$coefficients) )
  print(compare)
  plot(compare)
```

# prediction
```{r}
  mylm = linearFit(X,Y)
  newX = matrix(rnorm(p),ncol=p)
  lmPredict(mylm,newX)
```
